title: LFP All Sona and Ziggs Odyssey Mission
body:
LFP for mission:
Space Wizards’ Guild
(Clear Onslaught with all 5 people playing as either Ziggs or Sona)
and after:
Morning Star Veterans
(Clear Onslaught as a team without Sona or Ziggs, and only 1 Jinx))

replies.body: If you still need anyone, gimme a shout.  I've given up with trying to get 4 randoms to do the Ziggs/Sona mission.
